RootIndexPage.description: Navigate to /pl/[playlistId] to view a playlist

PlaylistRoutePage.defaultDescription: Your friend shared these videos as an encouragement to you. Press play for uplifting stories about finding peace in Jesus.
PlaylistRoutePage.description: Your friend {name} shared these videos as an encouragement to you. Press play for uplifting stories about finding peace in Jesus.

VideoPlayer.lackOfBrowserSupport: To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that <link>supports HTML5 video</link>

SharedPlaylistBanner.sharedWithYou: Your friend {name} shared these videos with you as an encouragement to you. The best way to view these videos is by downloading our app.
